answers.answer: Hi there!It is not abnormal to have or not to have an erection while driving, if the normal erectile dysfunction id unaffected while sexual arousal/ intercourse. If ED is noticed with other sexual activities evaluation by a urologist to consider possibilities such as psychological stress, performance anxiety, depression, neurogenic disorders peyronie's disease, body image issues, medications, alcohol, smoking, drugs/medications, hormonal imbalance, radiation therapy, kidney failure, metabolic disorders, multiple sclerosis, hypertension, diabetes, prostatitis, urethritis etc. may be sought. After a specific cause is identified, it can be managed accordingly.Hope this is helpful.Take care!

title: I dont if is just me or all men
